metadata.feature_description: Configures which directories to include or exclude from file crawling operations.

steps.action: Navigate to Admin > Site Settings > Search > Crawling tab
steps.expected: Included Directories section should be visible
steps.actual: Included Directories section is visible with 'Images/' already in the list

steps.action: View the list of included directories
steps.expected: List of included directories should be displayed
steps.actual: List shows 'Images/' directory with delete icon

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button in Included Directories section
steps.actual: Folder picker dialog opened showing folder tree with Site Root and subfolders

steps.action: Click Save to add the directory
steps.expected: Badges should be added to included directories list
steps.actual: Badges/ was successfully added to the Included Directories list

steps.action: Click delete icon next to 'Badges' in Included Directories
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete Badges?'

steps.expected: Badges should be removed from the list
steps.actual: Badges was successfully removed from Included Directories, only Images/ remains

steps.expected: Excluded Directories section should be visible
steps.actual: Excluded Directories section is visible and empty (no directories configured)

steps.action: Click 'Add Directory' button in Excluded Directories section
steps.actual: Folder picker dialog opened showing folder tree

steps.action: Click Save to add the directory
steps.expected: Templates should be added to excluded directories list
steps.actual: Templates was successfully added to the Excluded Directories list

steps.action: Click delete icon next to 'Templates' in Excluded Directories
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete Templates?'

steps.expected: Templates should be removed from the list
steps.actual: Templates was successfully removed from Excluded Directories

steps.action: Attempt to add 'Images' directory again (already in Included Directories)
steps.actual: API returned an error when attempting to add duplicate directory. Images/ remains as single entry in the list.

steps.action: Verify that directories are displayed with proper path format
steps.expected: Directories should show folder paths with trailing slash
steps.actual: Directories are displayed with proper path format (e.g., 'Images/', 'Badges/', 'Templates'). The folder picker shows proper tree structure with Site Root and nested folders.

observations: The folder picker UI requires clicking directly on folder items in the tree to select them - typing in the search box does not auto-select folders.
Overlapping UI elements sometimes intercept clicks, requiring JavaScript-based interaction for reliable testing.
The API properly validates and rejects duplicate directory additions, returning an error status.
Confirmation dialogs are shown before deleting directories, preventing accidental deletions.

The code structure (DirectoryIncludedException, DirectoryExcludedException) suggests parent/child folder conflict prevention exists, but this specific scenario was not explicitly testable through the UI during this session.
